Description.Details: Often found as the secondary weapon on heavier units, ELRM20 racks of Long-Range Missiles can deal decent damage while a unit closes range, but they chew through ammunition. Like all ELRMs, ELRM20s are capable of indirect fire over obstacles and terrain with the benefit of a spotter unit. Extended LRMs missile modifier is twice as detrimental when within minimum range and cannot benefit from a Narc Missile Beacon or TAG.

Modes.Name: Hot Load
Modes.Description: Missiles are armed inside the launcher instead of after launching, removing minimum range but having a chance to jam.
